span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 详细表达： to express more fully and in greater detail
【例】 He refused to dilate upon his plan for improving the economy in the event that he won the election.
【近】 amplify, develop, elaborate on, flesh out, dilate on, enlarge on
【反】 abbreviate, abridge, condense, shorten 删减，缩短
【考法 2】 vt. 扩大： to enlarge or expand in bulk or extent；to become wide
【例】 The cat dilated its eyes in the darkness. 猫在黑暗中睁大眼睛。
【例】 The drug dilates the blood vessels.药使血管膨胀。
【近】 expand, amplify['æmplɪfaɪ], enlarge
【反】 contract 收缩；narrow 使变窄
【记】 di- 二 + 音：拉它，两边拉它会伸长；di双倍 + late 迟到，延迟二倍，拖拖拉拉，做什么事都拉得很长，拉长，扩张
【另】 prolate 长的，
